SELECT * FROM ( SELECT R.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT SREG.NAME AS NAME , SREG.TEL AS TEL , SREG.SIT_REG_ID AS SIT_REG_ID , SBAC.REG_DATE AS REG_DATE , SREJ.REJECTED_DATE AS REJECTED_DATE , SRRE.REASON AS REASON FROM SIT_REJECTED SREJ JOIN SIT_BACKUP SBAC ON SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SREJ.SIT_BACKUP_ID JOIN SIT_REG SREG ON SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SREG.SIT_BACKUP_ID JOIN SIT_REJECTED_REASONS SRRE ON SREJ.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID = SRRE.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SIT_CHK C WHERE C.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SBAC.SIT_BACKUP_ID)
AND SREG.NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND SREG.TEL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY SREJ.REJECTED_DATE DESC ) R ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM SIT_REJECTED WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND TEL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SIT_REJECTED(SIT_REJECTED_ID, SIT_BACKUP_ID, SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID) VALUES('SREJ' || LPAD(SEQ_SREJ.NEXTVAL, 4, '0'), #{sit_backup_id}, #{sit_rejected_reason_id})
mapper.select: SELECT SR.SIT_REJECTED_ID AS SIT_REJECTED_ID , SB.SIT_BACKUP_ID AS SIT_BACKUP_ID, R.SIT_REG_ID AS SIT_REG_ID , RR.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID AS SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID , RR.REASON AS SRASON, SB.REG_DATE AS REG_DATE, SR.REJECTED_DATE FROM SIT_REJECTED SR JOIN SIT_REJECTED_REASONS RR ON RR.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID = SR.SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID JOIN SIT_BACKUP SB ON SR.SIT_BACKUP_ID = SB.SIT_BACKUP_ID JOIN SIT_REG R ON SB.SIT_BACKUP_ID = R.SIT_BACKUP_ID WHERE SR.SIT_BACKUP_ID = #{sit_backup_id}
SELECT SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID, REASON FROM SIT_REJECTED_REASONS WHERE SIT_REJECTED_REASON_ID != '006'
